title: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps are deployed
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps and accessing a URL, it returns a 200 OK HTTP code with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance without any webapps deployed and access a URL, it returns a 200 OK HTTP code with no content.
EB: The expected behavior is that it should return an HTTP error 404 indicating that the requested resource was not found.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Download Tomcat 7 from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip. 2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps. 3. Access a URL on the Tomcat server. The response should be a 200 OK HTTP code with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
